metadata.h1: Olive Garden Dessert Menu Summer 2025 ‚Äì Full Menu & Prices
metadata.description: Indulge in the Olive Garden dessert menu for Summer 2025. Explore a variety of sweet treats, including the famous Chocolate Lasagna and classic Tiramisu, with full prices and calorie information.

author.name: The Olive Garden Menu Guide Team

data.htmlContent: Olive Garden knows how to end a meal on a sweet note, and their dessert menu is proof. Each treat is crafted to satisfy those sugar cravings, no matter how full you think you are.

DESSERTS.description: Indulge your sweet tooth with our decadent desserts, from rich chocolate cakes to classic Italian tiramisu.

items.name: Tiramisu (V)
items.review: Save room for this! üç∞ Creamy, coffee-soaked ladyfingers and a dusting of cocoa. It's light, it's airy, and it's the perfect sweet ending to your meal. An Italian classic done right.

items.question: Can I order dessert at Olive Garden without having a full meal?
items.answer: Absolutely! You‚Äôre welcome to visit Olive Garden just for dessert, whether you‚Äôre dining in or opting for takeout.

items.question: Are there gluten-free dessert options available?
items.answer: Yes, Olive Garden offers gluten-free desserts, such as the Flourless Chocolate Torte.

items.question: How many calories are in the Black Tie Mousse Cake?
items.answer: The Black Tie Mousse Cake contains 750 calories per slice.
